definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: That was my last tampon . Are you packing?
sentences.chinese: 那是我最後一個衛生棉條你有帶嗎？
買洗頭液不難，買衛生棉條呢？

sentences.english: Ideally, how long should you leave in a tampon?
sentences.chinese: 理想情況下，你應該多長時間留在一個衛生棉條？

sentences.english: Even then I knew that tampons are gentle and tender lovers.
sentences.chinese: 即使在那時我也知道，衛生棉條是溫和及溫柔的情人。

sentences.english: I know cigarettes and tampons have a lot in common.
sentences.chinese: 我知道香菸和衛生棉條有很多共同之處。

sentences.english: Q-Tip and RZA join up to create a masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 棉條和RZA聯合起來創建一個傑作。

sentences.english: Double apron web take-off device allowing visual inspection of the web ensures sliver delivering constantly at high speed.
sentences.chinese: 可視棉網的雙皮圈導棉裝置，保證棉條高速穩定輸出。

sentences.english: So what is the relationship between tampons and crampons?
sentences.chinese: 至於棉條和冰爪究竟有什麼關係呢？

sentences.english: Increase the pressing roller pressure to shrink cotton, reducing channel blocking.
sentences.chinese: 加大壓輥壓力來收縮棉條，減少通道堵塞。

sentences.english: One quick test neps method for raw cotton and cotton sliver was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討一種快速測試原棉和棉條中棉結的方法。

sentences.english: At the doffer, fibers are removed and eventually enter the card sliver .
sentences.chinese: 纖維被從落紗機上剝下，形成梳棉棉條輸出。

sentences.english: And I still have mixed feelings. I mean, how can you conflate cigarettes and tampons ?
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，你怎麼能把香菸及衛生棉條混爲一談？

sentences.english: Do not use douches or tampons.
sentences.chinese: 不要灌洗或用月經棉條。

sentences.english: Some women worry about their personal exposure to dioxins through tampons.
sentences.chinese: 一些女士擔心會因爲棉條接觸到二噁英。

sentences.english: Black spot indicates successive movement of sliver trough a combing cycle.
sentences.chinese: 黑點表明棉條在一個精梳週期上的連續運動。

definition: sponge (zoology)/sponge (piece of absorbent material, either natural or made from plastic etc)/foam rubber
